Interact with a Source Process File

Source: R/pophive_source_process.R
pophive_source_process.Rd

Read or update the current source process file.

Usage

pophive_source_process(path = "process.json", updated = NULL)

Arguments

path

Path to the process JSON file.

updated

An update version of the process definition. If specified, will write this as the new process file, rather than reading any existing file.

Value

The process definition of the source project.

Examples

epic_process_file <- "../../data/epic/process.json"
if (file.exists(epic_process_file)) {
  pophive_source_process(path = epic_process_file)
}
#> $name
#> [1] "epic"
#> 
#> $scripts
#> $scripts[[1]]
#> $scripts[[1]]$path
#> [1] "ingest.R"
#> 
#> $scripts[[1]]$manual
#> [1] TRUE
#> 
#> $scripts[[1]]$frequency
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> $scripts[[1]]$last_run
#> [1] "2025-07-01 15:07:34"
#> 
#> $scripts[[1]]$run_time
#> [1] 0.08
#>
